name: opencode-beautiful-mermaid
description: Opencode plugin for rendering mermaid diagrams as Unicode/ASCII art using beautiful-mermaid

scripts.build: bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile ./dist/index.js --target bun --format esm

author: Arthur Tyukayev

plugin.name: mermaid-renderer
plugin.description: Render mermaid diagrams as beautiful ASCII/Unicode art. Supports any valid mermaid diagram type.
